name: AxialControl
0:
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen light”
”Alexa, set the kitchen light to 20 percent”
”Alexa, turn off the kitchen light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your home automation devices, including z-wave, Philips Hue and Sonos. Lights, devices and scenes can be activated using voice control. 

You will need to have Axial Server running on your home computer and have it pre-configured to control your home automation devices. Your Axial Server must also be linked to your axialcontrol.com account.
